current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To require agencies to set forth reasons for determining
		  that a proposed regulatory action is significant.

sponsor.#tail:
introduced
			 the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Homeland Security and
			 Governmental Affairs

short-title.#text:
Restoring Integrity to our
			 Government Act

text.#text:
This Act may be cited as
			 the

term.#tail: means any authority of the United States that is—

text.#text:
shall include an
			 independent regulatory agency as defined under

means an agency
			 statement of general applicability and future effect, which the agency intends
			 to have the force and effect of law, that is designed to implement, interpret,

			 requirements of an agency; and

a

a
			 regulation that pertains to a military or foreign affairs function of the
			 United States, other than procurement regulations and regulations involving the
			 import or export of non-defense articles and services; or

term.#tail:
means any substantive action by an agency
			 (normally published in the Federal Register) that promulgates or is expected to
			 lead to the promulgation of a final regulation, including notices of inquiry,
			 advance notices of proposed rulemaking, and notices of proposed rulemaking;
			 and

means any regulatory action that is
			 likely to result in a regulation that may—

text.#text:
have an annual
			 effect on the economy of $100,000,000 or more or adversely affect in a material
			 way the economy, a sector of the economy, productivity, competition, jobs, the
			 environment, public health or safety, or State, local, or tribal governments or

add to the

text.#text:

A proposed significant regulatory action may
			 not be finalized unless the proposed significant regulatory action includes the
			 reason or reasons why the agency proposing the significant regulatory action
			 determined that the proposed significant regulatory action is a significant
			 regulatory action.

header.#text:
Finalization of
			 proposed significant regulatory actions
